title: Stitching
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123174000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Type and Lettering Styles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123174000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20and%20Lettering%20Styles) : Stitching**

[Billes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123174000/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=TB.100563.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Please+Remove+Your+Shoes&sampleSize=24&attributes.paraSize=14&paraSize=14) by [Clotilde Olyff](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123174000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Clotilde%20Olyff) ( [2Rebels](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123174000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/2Rebels))

author: Christian Bélanger
